data.title: Dallas Mavericks vs Oklahoma City Thunder schedule: How to watch NBA Playoffs series on TV
data.meta_description: How to watch Dallas Mavericks vs Oklahoma City Thunder 2024 NBA Playoffs series on television, including dates, times, TV channels, streaming.
data.text:
The Dallas Mavericks, the No. 5 seed in the Western Conference, and the Oklahoma City Thunder, the No. 1 seed, face off in a Western Conference semifinals NBA Playoffs series.

The Mavericks went 50-32 in the regular season. The Thunder were 57-25.

Dallas defeated the No. 4 seed Los Angeles Clippers in six games in the first round. Oklahoma City swept the No. 8 seed New Orleans Pelicans in four games.

The Thunder won three of the four games in the regular season series.

The Thunder have home court advantage in the series and host games 1, 2, 5 and 7 in the seven-game series, with the Mavericks hosting games 3, 4 and 6.

All times Pacific (add three hours for Eastern time).

NBA Playoffs schedule: Mavericks vs Thunder | Timberwolves vs Nuggets | Pacers vs Knicks | Cavaliers vs Celtics | Daily NBA game schedule

Dallas Mavericks vs. Oklahoma City Thunder NBA Playoffs schedule, TV information

Game 1: Thunder 117, Mavericks 95 (Thunder lead series, 1-0)

Game 2: Mavericks 119, Thunder 110 (Series tied, 1-1)

Game 3: Mavericks 105, Thunder 101 (Mavericks lead series, 2-1)

Game 4: Thunder 100, Mavericks 96 (Series tied, 2-2)

Game 5: Mavericks 104, Thunder 92 (Mavericks lead series, 3-2)

Game 6: Mavericks 117, Thunder 116 (Mavericks win series, 4-2)
